text:
Scott Disick has a new lady in his life. In recent months, Kourtney Kardashian’s famous ex, 34, has been spotted getting cozy in multiple locations with Sofia Richie, 19. The lovebirds have smooched over desserts, for example; they’ve also hit up Art Basel as a pair. But, not everyone is swooning over the romance — and some are even slightly perturbed in the age difference between the two. And by some, of course, we mean Kendall Jenner.

On January 28, a fan account dedicated to Disick showcased a photo of “The Lord” driving with Richie at his side. In the backseat, a kiddo that appeared to be Penelope Scotland Disick, 5, buckled up.

How cute, right? It would appear that Kendall Jenner agrees — with plenty of apparent sarcasm to go around. Getting savage with her iPhone and five words, the model left a comment on the photo of the modern family outing. “Aww, Scott and his kids,” Jenner wrote, with a widely grinning emoji that underscored her absolute euphoria for the pair.

Disick and Richie didn't appear to let the shady comment bother them, however. The day after Jenner chimed in on the pic of their outing, the two were photographed dining at Tosconova restaurant in Calabasas.

Though Jenner seems to have taken a swipe at Disick, chances are the comment is in good fun. After all, Kourtney has moved on herself. Jenner’s big sis was last spotted living her best life in Mexico, with her 24-year-old beau Younes Bendjima at her bikini-clad side.
title: Kendall Jenner Threw Shade at Scott Disick and Sofia Richie
